nodes.bodyText: Consider exposing a timeout field here, rather than only including it in the message. This may make certain logging scenarios easier.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+/*

+ *

+ * version 2.0 (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance

+ * under the License.
+ */
+package io.netty.handler.ssl;
+
+import javax.net.ssl.SSLHandshakeException;
+
+/**
+ * {@link SSLHandshakeException} that is used when a handshake failed due a configured timeout.
+ */
+public final class SslHandshakeTimeoutException extends SSLHandshakeException {
+
+    public SslHandshakeTimeoutException(String reason) {
+        super(reason);
+    }
+}

nodes.bodyText: let me keep it simple for now and not do this for now. I will make the constructor package-private as well so we can add it easy later on.

nodes.bodyText: Naming wise maybe we should keep it consistent? Ssl => SSL.
